title: The Global Drone 4K Platinum, on sale for $80, makes a great Father’s Day gift
content:
Macworld

Camera drones are great for capturing aerial photos and video. But they can be expensive to own — And, if you’re new to flying, you could lose your investment with just one miscalculation. Want a more beginner-friendly alternative? Then the Global Drone 4K Platinum Version is a great option.

The easy to fly Global Drone 4K Platinum Version is ideal for anyone just getting started with aerial photography. It offers three different speeds to suit a variety of abilities, it has an altitude hold feature for stable flight, and it’s equipped with sensors that allow it to easily perform stunts. 

But its photographic potential is what really sets the Global Drone 4K apart. It’s equipped with a high-definition camera that can capture video in stunning 4k, it features a generous range of about 328’, and you can connect it to your phone to take photos and video in real-time.

Got a dad who likes photography, drones, or gadgets? Then the Global Drone 4K Platinum Version is a great choice for Father’s Day. And since you can get it on sale for well below the regular price, it’s cost-effective too. Note that you’ll need to order by June 5 to guarantee delivery by Father’s Day.

Get the Global Drone 4K Platinum Version for just $79.97 until 11:59 pm on June 11, no coupon codes required.
